articles.title: Morocco approves use of AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine - The Hindu
articles.description: The country's Health Ministry said Wednesday that the Serum Institute of India in under contract from AstraZeneca to make the shots.
articles.content:
Morocco has approved the emergency use of the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine, jointly developed with the U.K.'s Oxford University.

articles.title: The Latest: Australia moves up vaccination start to February - KIRO Seattle
articles.description: Australia is advancing its coronavirus vaccination program to mid-February, with plans to inoculate 15% of the population by late March
articles.content:
